text: Accha, tomara ki tajjaba haccho ye tomadera kache tomadera prabhura nikata theke upadesa eseche tomadera'i madhyekara ekajana manusera madhyame yena tini tomadera satarka karena? Ara smarana karo, kemana ka’re tini tomadera nuh‌-era sampradayera parabartikale pratinidhi baniyechilena, ara tomadera bardhita karechena akrtira baisistye. Sutaram tomara allah‌ra anugrahasamuha smarana karo yena tomara saphala hate paro.’’
